naming_guidelines.description: Product names should be between short and long, ideally fitting within the 'Goldilocks Zone' and under 90 characters.
Create a unique, specific product name that isn't word-for-word on other websites.
If relevant, include color of the item in the product name.
Capitalize the first letter of each word, except for articles, conjunctions, and prepositions.
The title should include keywords that describe the product, avoiding generic titles.
Avoid using special characters such as '!', '?', '$', etc., unless they represent the brand legally.
Do not include promotional phrases like 'best selling' or 'free shipping' in titles.
The product name is a required attribute.
